actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.
Subcommittee on Merchant Marine. Hearings held.

official_title: A bill to allow vessels in the foreign trade receiving subsidy to transport cargo between the Island of Unalaska, Alaska and the contiguous United States during a voyage in the foreign trade.

summary.text: Amends the Merchant Marine Act, 1936, to allow vessels in the foreign trade receiving operating-differential or construction-differential subsidies to transport cargo between the island of Unalaska, Alaska, and the contiguous United States during a voyage in the foreign trade.

titles.title: A bill to allow vessels in the foreign trade receiving subsidy to transport cargo between the Island of Unalaska, Alaska and the contiguous United States during a voyage in the foreign trade.
